name: Overherd (itch)
description:
Overherd

Overherd is a 3d voxel game where you try to collect your escaping sheep.

Controls
Right mouse - Rotate camera
WASD - Move
R - Restart level
ESC - Pause
Scroll wheel - Zoom camera
Hold left click - Charge hook
Release left click (after charged) - Hook sheep
Click left click (after sheep is hooked) - Throw sheep

Other information
This is a compo game that turned into jam because I needed some more time :)
